title: Collaborative Inquiry Learning Design for Tablet-Based Virtual Manipulative Tools in Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Science Education Methodology and Digital Tool Application Experience
context.additional_context: Technology Integration Training for Current Practitioners to Develop and Apply Science Education Content

learning_goals: Explain effective strategies for utilizing tablet-based virtual manipulatives in collaborative inquiry learning environments
Analyze the impact of 1:1 or 1:m tablet-to-student ratios on learning outcomes
Design cognitive load reduction strategies based on the presence or absence of external scripts
Develop case studies applying virtual manipulatives for collaborative problem-solving in simulation/VR environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
